articles.title: Gifts to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Russia
articles.content:
Gifts to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Russia
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) --  SECRETARY KIM JONG IL 
RECEIVED GIFTS FROM THE PERMANENT STANDING COMMITTEE OF THE 
SOVIET CONGRESS OF PEOPLE'S DEPUTIES AND THE PARTY FOR PEACE 
AND UNITY ON THE OCCASION OF HIS 55TH BIRTHDAY.
   THE GIFTS WERE HANDED TO THE DPRK AMBASSADOR TO RUSSIA ON 
FEB. 18 BY SAZHI UMALATOVA, CHAIRPERSON OF THE PERMANENT 
STANDING COMMITTEE OF THE SOVIET CONGRESS OF PEOPLE'S 
DEPUTIES AND CHAIRPERSON OF THE PARTY FOR PEACE AND UNITY.

articles.title: NDFSK flails Kim Young Sam's "statement to people"
articles.content:
NDFSK flails Kim Young Sam's "statement to people"
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC 
FRONT OF SOUTH KOREA (NDFSK) CENTRAL COMMITTEE RELEASED A 
STATEMENT FEBRUARY 27 FLAILING THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM'S 
"STATEMENT TO PEOPLE",  SEOUL-BASED RADIO VOICE OF NATIONAL 
SALVATION SAID.
   KIM YOUNG SAM'S "STATEMENT TO PEOPLE" WAS NO MORE THAN A 
HOKUM TO EVADE JUDICIAL RESPONSIBILITY AND  PUBLIC 
CONDEMNATION FOR THE HANBO INCIDENT, THE LARGEST-EVER 
SCANDAL BY "CHONGWADAE", AND ANOTHER SHAMELESS POLITICAL 
DRAMA FAR FROM REPENTANCE AND APOLOGY, THE STATEMENT SAID.
   WHAT THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, WHO IS INTERESTED ONLY IN 
MAINTAINING POWER AND MAKING MONEY, BEREFT OF PHILOSOPHY AND 
THE CAPACITY OF RUNNING THE STATE, SHOULD DO IS TO STEP DOWN 
FROM THE POWER AND STAND JUDGED, IT STRESSED.
    NOTING THAT THE UNITED STATES CAN NOT FLEE FROM 
RESPONSIBILITY FOR BACKING SUCH A "CIVILIAN" FASCIST AND THE 
KINGPIN OF IRREGULARITIES AS KIM YOUNG SAM, THE STATEMENT 
SAID THE U.S. SHOULD BREAK WITH THE CIVILIAN-VEILED 
DICTATORSHIP AND STOP INTERFERING IN INTERNAL AFFAIRS OF 
SOUTH KOREA.

articles.title: Japan urged to quit reinvasion design
articles.content:
Japan urged to quit reinvasion design
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- JAPANESE CHIEF CABINET 
SECRETARY SEIROKU KAJIYAMA RECENTLY TOLD THE BUDGET 
COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES THAT THE ISSUE OF 
COPING WITH "CONTINGENCY" SHOULD BE EXAMINED POSITIVELY.
   VIEWING HIS REMARKS AS AN OPEN CALL FOR REINVASION, 
TODAY'S RODONG SINMUN SAYS WHAT HE SAID REVEALED THE 
INTENTION TO STEP UP THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A WARTIME 
MOBILIZATION SYSTEM UNDER THE PRETEXT OF COPING WITH 
"CONTINGENCY" IN THE KOREAN PENINSULA.
   IN A COMMENTARY THE DAILY SAYS:
   THE MAINPOINT OF JAPAN'S POLICY TOWARDS KOREA IS TO PAVE 
THE WAY FOR REINVASION OF KOREA AND STIFLE THE DEMOCRATIC 
PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF KOREA MILITARILY IN SUCH A WAY AS
"COPING WITH CONTINGENCY" IN THE KOREAN PENINSULA IN CONCERT 
WITH THE UNITED STATES.
   THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES ARE SPREADING RUMORS ABOUT THE 
DPRK'S "POSSIBLE ATTACK" TO FOSTER ANTAGONISM AGAINST THE 
DPRK AMONG THE JAPANESE PEOPLE AND KEEP THE "SELF-DEFENCE 
FORCES" IN FULL COMBAT READINESS. THEY ARE ALSO TRYING TO 
ENACT A WARTIME LAW TO LEGALLY USE JAPAN'S HUMAN AND 
MATERIAL POTENTIALS IN THE REINVASION OF KOREA.
   REINVASION WILL BRING JAPAN TO DESTRUCTION.
   THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES HAD BETTER CLEARLY SEE THE 
SITUATION AND ACT PROPERLY.
   THE KOREAN PEOPLE WILL NEVER REMAIN AN ONLOOKER TO THEIR 
MOVES OF REINVASION.
   THE JAPANESE REACTIONARIES MUST GIVE UP THE DESIGN OF 
REINVASION AT ONCE, SETTLE THE PAST AND SEEK GOOD-
NEIGHBOUR AND FRIENDLY TIES WITH THE DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Hyon Chol's attempted flight revealed
articles.content:
Kim Hyon Chol's attempted flight revealed
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- A FACT THAT THE TRAITOR KIM 
YOUNG SAM OF SOUTH KOREA WAS SCHEMING TO WHISK OFF ABROAD 
HIS SON KIM HYON CHOL, WHO ACTED HIS FATHER'S PROXY IN THE 
HANBO INCIDENT, WAS REVEALED AT THE EXTRAORDINARY SESSION OF 
THE PUPPET NATIONAL ASSEMLY HELD ON FEBRUARY 27, A SEOUL-
BASED RADIO SAID.
   IN QUESTIONS TO  THE "GOVERNMENT" AT THE SESSION, AN 
ASSEMBLYMAN FROM THE NATIONAL CONGRESS FOR NEW POLITICS 
TOUCHED ON THE RUMOR OF KIM HYON CHOL'S ATTEMPTED RUNAWAY TO 
OTHER COUNTRY, ASKING THE AUTHORITIES WHETHER THEY HAVE NO 
WILLINGNESS TO STOP HIM FROM RUNAWAY.
   POINTING OUT THAT KIM HYON CHOL HAS BEEN STRONGLY 
SUSPECTED OVER THE HANBO INCIDENT,  HE EXPRESSED THE 
WILLINGNESS NOT TO  ALLOW SUCH CRIMINAL'S OVERSEAS  FLIGHT.

articles.title: Papers congratulate Libyan people on holiday
articles.content:
Papers congratulate Libyan people on holiday
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- PYONGYANG-BASED PAPERS TODAY 
OBSERVE THE 20TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE PROCLAMATION OF THE 
SOCIALIST PEOPLE'S LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA.
   AFTER THE PROCLAMATION OF THE JAMAHIRIYA THE LIBYAN 
PEOPLE  HAVE MADE A GREAT PROGRESS IN THE EFFORTS FOR 
DEFENCE OF THE NATIONAL DIGNITY AND SOVEREIGNTY AND FOR THE 
PROSPERITY OF THE COUNTRY UNDER THE LEADERSHIP OF MOAMMER EL 
GADDAFI, LEADER OF THE GREAT SEPTEMBER FIRST REVOLUTION, 
RODONG SINMUN SAYS IN AN ARTICLE, AND GOES ON:
   LIBYA, A "NON-ALIGNED STATE, IS DEVELOPING FRIENDLY AND 
COOPERATIVE RELATIONS WITH OTHER ARAB COUNTRIES STRUGGLING 
FOR NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND SOVEREIGNTY, AND OTHER 
COUNTRIES AROUND THE WORLD, ADHERING TO THE INDEPENDENT 
STAND AGAINST IMPERIALISM.
   THE KOREAN PEOPLE ARE SINCERELY REJOICED OVER THE 
ACHIEVEMENTS MADE BY THE LIBYAN PEOPLE IN THE BUILDING OF AN 
INDEPENDENT NEW SOCIETY AND EXTEND FIRM SOLIDARITY TO THEIR 
JUST CAUSE.
   THE KOREA-LIBYA FRIENDSHIP, FORGED AND CONSOLIDATED IN 
JOINT STRUGGLE FOR INDEPENDENCE AGAINST IMPERIALISM, IS 
DEVELOPING MORE FAVOURABLY DAY BY DAY.
   AN ARTICLE OF MINJU JOSON SAYS THE KOREAN PEOPLE 
SINCERELY WISH THE LIBYAN PEOPLE GREATER SUCCESS IN THE 
FUTURE STRUGGLE FOR DEFENDING NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY AND 
FOR THE PROSPERITY OF THE COUNTRY.

articles.title: Chongryon meeting for thanking Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chongryon meeting for thanking Secy. Kim Jong Il
   TOKYO, FEBRUARY 28 (KNS-KCNA) -- A CENTRAL MEETING OF THE 
GENERAL ASSOCIATION OF KOREAN RESIDENTS IN JAPAN (CHONGRYON) 
TOOK PLACE IN TOKYO ON FEB. 27 TO EXTEND THANKS TO SECRETARY
KIM JONG IL FOR SENDING THE 136TH INSTALMENT OF EDUCATIONAL 
AID FUND AND STIPENDS.
   VICE-CHAIRMAN OF THE CHONGRYON CENTRAL STANDING COMMITTEE 
KWON SUN HWI IN HIS REPORT SAID THAT ALL THE ORGANIZATIONS  
AND ORGANS OF CHONGRYON WILL IN THE FUTURE, TOO, POWERFULLY 
CONDUCT THE PATRIOTIC MOVEMENT, PLACING THE NATIONAL 
EDUCATION IN THE CENTRE OF THEIR ACTIVITIES, AND MAKE A NEW 
ADVANCE IN  BRINGING UP THE RISING GENERATIONS TO BE 
SUCCESSORS TO THE PATRIOTIC CAUSE AND FIRMLY UNITING 
COMPATRIOTS AROUND SECRETARY KIM JONG IL.
   A LETTER TO SECRETARY KIM JONG IL WAS ADOPTED AT THE
MEETING.

articles.title: KJU brands  Kim Young Sam as chief culprit of Hanbo Incident
articles.content:
KJU brands  Kim Young Sam as chief culprit of Hanbo Incident

COMMITTEE OF THE KOREAN JOURNALISTS UNION IN A STATEMENT ON

   IT IS KIM YOUNG SAM WHO IS HAMPERING SECURITY AND 
CREATING PUBLIC UNEASINESS IN SOUTH KOREA. THE "SECURITY" 
BALLAD ON THE LIPS OF KIM YOUNG SAM CLEARLY SHOWS THAT HIS 
TALK ABOUT "RESPONSIBILITY" AND "REGRET" IS ONLY EMPTY WORDS 
TO FOOL THE PEOPLE AND EMERGE FROM THE PRESENT RULING 
CRISIS. KIM YOUNG SAM MUST STEP DOWN WITHOUT DELAY AND STAND 
CONDEMNED BY THE PEOPLE, BEARING RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE 
RETROGRESSIVE REVISION OF EVIL LAWS, ECONOMIC  FAILURE AND 
MISRULE.

articles.title: Seamy side of wholesale resignations in s. Korea

Seamy side of wholesale resignations in s. Korea

COMMENTARY TODAY LAYS BARE THE SEAMY SIDE OF SENIOR 
OFFICIALS' WHOLESALE RESIGNATIONS IN SOUTH KOREA.
   THEIR RESIGNATIONS WERE DIRECTED BY THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG 
SAM  IN THE HOPE OF COVERING UP HIS TRUE COLORS AS THE CHIEF 
CULPRIT OF THE HANBO INCIDENT, THE DAILY SAYS, AND GOES ON:
   THIS TIME, TOO, THE TRAITOR IS TRYING TO AVOID THE BLAME 
FOR THE HANBO INSIDENT LIKE A LIZARD EMERGING FROM THE 
DANGER BY CUTTING ITS TAIL.
   IT IS KIM YOUNG SAM WHO MUST TENDER HIS RESIGNATION AND 
STAND TRIAL BEFORE ANYONE ELSE AS REGARDS THE HANBO 
INCIDENT.
   IN A "STATEMENT TO THE PEOPLE" HE PRETENDED AS IF HE 
WOULD TAKE ALL THE BLAME  FOR THE HANBO INCIDENT. IF IT IS

HENCHMEN AND DISMISS THEM BUT QUIT THE "PRESIDENTIAL" SEAT  
AND GO TO PRISON OF HIS OWN ACCORD BEFORE ANYONE ELSE.

articles.title: Truth behind Hanbo Incident should be fully probed
articles.content:
Truth behind Hanbo Incident should be fully probed
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- THE SOUTH KOREAN PEOPLE 
SHOULD BRING INTO BOLD RELIEF THE SEAMY SIDE OF THE HANBO 
INCIDENT THE KIM YOUNG SAM GROUP WAS DEEPLY INVOLVED IN AS 
WELL AS HIS 1992 "PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION" FUNDS AND STERNLY

   RODONG SINMUN SAYS THIS IN A SIGNED ARTICLE TODAY. 
   THE DAILY BRANDS THE PUPPETS' "INVESTIGATION" INTO THE 
HANBO INCIDENT AS A DECEPTIVE DRAMA BASED ON THE 
SCRIPT OF KIM YOUNG SAM.
   IF THE INCIDENT IS NOT PROBED FULLY BUT BURIED IN 
OBLIVION, IT WILL SET A PRECEDENT THAT THE RULER IS LEFT 
UNPUNISHED FOR ILLICIT ACCUMULATION OF WEALTH AND ALL OTHER 
WRONGDOINGS. 
   IF THE HANBO INCIDENT IS LEFT IN OBLIVION, IT WILL BE 
IMPOSSIBLE TO CHECK THE IRREGULARITIES OF KIM YOUNG SAM AND 
HIS SUCCESSOR BY ABUSING POWER.  AND IF THE INCIDENT IS NOT 
PROBED THOROUGHLY, THE CORRUPTION OF THE "GOVERNMENT" AND 
"COLLUSION BETWEEN POLITICS AND BUSINESS", WHICH HAVE BECOME 
A CHRONIC DISEASE OF SOUTH KOREA, CANNOT BE ELIMINATED.
   IN ORDER TO UPROOT THE IRREGULARITIES PREVALENT IN SOUTH 
KOREA, IT IS NECESSARY FIRST OF ALL TO MAKE A THOROUGHGOING 
INVESTIGATION INTO THE CRIMES OF KIM YOUNG SAM, A BIG THIEF 
OF "CHONGWADAE" AND THE CHIEF CULPRIT OF THE HANBO INCIDENT, 
AND  STERNLY PUNISH HIM.
   THOROUGHGOING INVESTIGATION IS ALSO NECESSARY TO KEEP THE 
FABULOUS SUM OF MONEY COLLECTED FROM THE SOUTH KOREAN PEOPLE 
FROM BEING USED FOR THE CRIMINAL PURPOSE OF THE PUPPET 
RULING GROUP  OF TRAITORS.

articles.title: NDFSK on Hanbo Incident
articles.content:
NDFSK on Hanbo Incident
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- THE PROPAGANDA DEPARTMENT OF 
THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF SOUTH KOREA (NDFSK) CENTRAL 
COMMITTEE RELEASED A STATEMENT ON FEB. 26 MAKING PUBLIC THE 
DETAILS OF THE HANBO INCIDENT, THE LARGEST-EVER SCANDAL 
RELATED TO "CHONGWADAE", OR "PRESIDENTIAL OFFICE, SEOUL-
BASED RADIO VOICE OF NATIONAL SALVATION SAID.
   THE STATEMENT SAID THE INCIDENT IS AN UNPRECEDENTED POWER-
BACKED SCANDAL WHICH HAS CAUSED A SERIOUS POLITICAL PROBLEM 
AND PUBLIC ANGER AND AN OFFSPRING OF TIES BETWEEN KIM YOUNG 
SAM, KINGPIN OF "CIVILIAN" THIEVES, AND CHUNG TAE SOO, 
GENERAL CHAIRMAN OF THE HANBO BUSINESS GROUP. IT FURTHER SAID:
   THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, PREOCCUPIED WITH ILLICIT 
ACCUMULATION OF WEALTH, HAD LIKED CHUNG, WHO WAS VERY BROAD-
MINDED IN BRIBERY THOUGH HE WAS INFERIOR THAN OTHER 
BUSINESS GIANTS IN KNOWLEDGE OF BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT AND 
SMALLER IN CAPITAL.
   AFTER THE THREE-PARTY MERGER IN 1990, KIM, THROUGH HIS 
SON KIM HYON CHOL, WON OVER CHUNG PO GUN AND THEN HIS FATHER 
CHUNG TAE SOO.
   AT THAT TIME, KIM MET CHUNG TAE SOO AND ASKED FOR HIS 
FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR THE "PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION" IN 1992 
WITH A PROMISE TO HELP HIM TURN HIS BUSINESS INTO A LEADING 
CONGLOMERATE OF SOUTH KOREA AFTER HIS ASSUMPTION OF OFFICE.
   AFTER HE CAME TO POWER, KIM FORMED A CLANDESTINE GROUP AT 
"CHONGWADAE" TO BACK PREFERENTIAL LOANS FOR THE HANBO 
BUSINESS GROUP.
   SINCE THEN, HE HAD RECEIVED A FAT BRIBE FROM THE HANBO 
BUSINESS GROUP THROUGH THE CHUNG TAE SOO-CHUNG PO GUN-KIM 
HYON CHOL CHANNEL WHICH HAD FATTEN UP THE GROUP WITH 
UNRESTRICTED LOANS FROM BANKS.
   KIM YOUNG SAM, WHO HAS BEEN WORRIED ABOUT THE 1997 
"PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION" AND HIS SECURITY AFTER RETIREMENT,   
PUT THE HANBO-SUPPORTING GROUP INTO FULL CAPACITY, RESORTING 
TO THE THREE-MAN CHANNEL.
   HAN RI HON, WHO WAS SENIOR ECONOMIC SECRETARY OF 
"CHONGWADAE", OPENLY PRESSURIZED BANK MANAGERS AND OTHER 
FINANCIAL OFFICIALS TO GRANT HANBO AGAIN A LOAN OF 780 
BILLION WON WITHOUT COLLATERAL, FOR WHICH KIM YOUNG SAM 
RECEIVED 270 BILLION WON FROM CHUNG TAE SOO.
   BY "CHONGWADAE'S" PERSISTENT PRESSURE ON FINANCIAL 
CIRCLES, THE FUND INVESTED IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE HANBO 
STEELWORKS WAS ENLARGED FROM 1,300 BILLION WON TO 5,700 
BILLION WON.
   THE MONEY KIM RECEIVED FROM CHUNG IN RETURN FOR 
PREFERENTIAL LOANS AMOUNTS TO MORE THAN 1,000 BILLION WON.
   WHEN THE HANBO STEELWORKS WAS DECLARED INSOLVENT AND 
"CHONGWADAE" BEGAN TO BE SUSPECTED OF PREFERENTIAL LOANS, 
KIM YOUNG SAM SAT IN CONCLAVE WITH HIS ASSOCIATES FOR HOURS 
OVER THE INCIDENT ON JAN. 24.
   THEIR MEETING WAS FOLLOWED BY DISCUSSIONS AT "CHONGWADAE" 
TO COVER UP OR MINIMIZE THE INCIDENT.
   "CHONGWADAE", THE "AGENCY FOR NATIONAL SECURITY PLANNING" 
AND PROSECUTION HAD OFTEN PHONED CHUNG TAE SOO TO DISCUSS 
THE ORIENTATION OF INVESTIGATION.
   AFTER MAKING FULL PREPARATIONS FOR INVESTIGATION, 
PROSECUTION SUMMONED CHUNG ON JAN. 30.
   AT THE SAME TIME, KIM YOUNG SAM JUDGED THE HANBO INCIDENT 
AS A  MERE "LOAN SCANDAL" AND FOCUSSED IT ON THE POLITICAL 
CAMP. THROUGH THE "INITIAL INVESTIGATION RESULTS" ISSUED ON 
FEB. 19 AND HIS "STATEMENT TO THE PEOPLE" ON FEB. 25, HE 
PLAYED A BRAZEN-FACED DECEPTIVE DRAMA OF DETAINING SOME 
PETTY PERSONS.
   HE WAS GOING TO MAKE "PARTY AND CABINET SHAKEUP" IN A BID 
TO VEIL HIS TRUE COLORS AS THE CHIEF CULPRIT OF THE SCANDAL.
   SUCH A CORRUPT SOCIETY AS SOUTH KOREA SHOULD BE DESTROYED 
WITHOUT DELAY AND KIM YOUNG SAM, KINGPIN OF IRREGULARITIES, 
STERNLY PUNISHED.

articles.title: CPRF bitterly condemns s. Korea's slander against north's political system
articles.content:
CPRF bitterly condemns s. Korea's slander against north's political system
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 2 (KCNA) -- THE SPOKESMAN FOR THE 
COMMITTEE FOR THE PEACEFUL REUNIFICATION OF THE FATHERLAND 
(CPRF) RELEASED A STATEMENT TODAY BITTERLY DENOUNCING THE 
SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS FOR ESCALATING SLANDERS AGAINST THE 
NORTH'S POLITICAL SYSTEM.   THE STATEMENT SAYS:
   ON FEB. 27, SOUTH KOREA'S CHOONG-ANG DAILY CARRIED A 
FALSE REPORT SPEAKING ILL OF THE HEADQUARTERS OF OUR 
REVOLUTION AS REGARDS THE JULY, 1994, MISFORTUNE. THE FACT 
SHOWS HOW GRAVE THEIR ANTI-NORTH SMEAR CAMPAIGN HAS BECOME.
   THEY USED TO EMPLOY EVERY CONCEIVABLE MEANS TO ABUSE OUR 
SYSTEM, BUT NEVER HAS THERE BEEN SUCH A GROUNDLESS AND 
PERNICIOUS ALLEGATION AS THE LATEST ONE.
   IT IS THE WORST SLANDER AGAINST THE NORTH WHICH THE 
PUPPET AGENCY FOR NATIONAL SECURITY PLANNING, THE GENERAL 
HEADQUARTERS OF ANTI-COMMUNIST PLOTS, INVENTED ON THE ORDER 
OF THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM, WHO IS ON THE EVE OF 
DESTRUCTION.
   THE CPRK, EXPRESSING A SURPRISE AND RESENTMENT AT THE 
SLANDER, MAKES CLEAR OUR POSITION TO THE PREPOSTEROUS 
ALLEGATION INVENTED BY THE TRAITOR, WHO WAS PREPARING  INTER-
KOREAN SUMMIT AT THAT TIME, BY USING AN OUTSIDER WHO HAD NO 
RELATIONS TO THE PREPARATIONS.
   THE LATEST SLANDER IS A DELIBERATE AND PREMEDITATED 
PROVOCATION AGAINST OUR DIGNIFIED SYSTEM AND THE MOST 
GRAVE INFRINGEMENT UPON THE BASIC INTERESTS OF OUR PEOPLE 
AND ALL THE KOREAN NATION.
   THE ABUSE, WHICH HURT AGAIN OUR PEOPLE AND ALL OTHER 
FELLOW COUNTRYMEN, WHO SUFFERED THE GREATEST MISFORTUNE, IS 
A NEVER-TO-BE-CONDONED CRIME ADDED TO THE ANTI-ETHICAL 
AND ANTI-NATIONAL CRIME OF THE BLACKEST DYE HE COMMITTED AT 
THE TIME OF THE MISFORTUNE THREE YEARS AGO.
   THROUGH THE FALSE REPORT, THE TRAITOR INTENDS TO DIVERT 
PUBLIC ATTENTION ELSEWHERE FROM THE HANBO INCIDENT AND 
WORKERS' STRIKES WHICH HAVE DRIVEN HIMSELF INTO THE WORST 
CRISIS SINCE HE CAME TO POWER. HE ALSO INTENDS TO ROLL BACK 
THE TIDE OF THE SITUATION EVEN A LITTLE BIT.
   WE CONSIDER THE LATEST PROVOCATION TO BE AN OUTSPOKEN 
ATTACK ON OUR MOST PRECIOUS SYSTEM OUR PEOPLE ARE DEFENDING 
AS THEIR LIFE AND TO BE A DECLARATION OF WAR AGAINST OUR 
REPUBLIC.
   A PROVOCATEUR DESERVES RETALIATION AND ONE WHO TRIES 
TO HURT OUR DESTINY IS DOOMED TO DESTRUCTION.
   NOW THAT THE SOUTH KOREAN PUPPETS HAVE CHALLENGED US, 
WE CANNOT BUT  RESPOND IN KIND. 
   THE PROVOCATEURS MUST KNOW WELL OF WHAT GRAVE  SITUATION 
WILL BE CREATED ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA  AS A RESULT OF THE 
SHOWDOWN, AND THEY WILL HAVE TO DRINK A BITTER CUP. 
   THE TRAITOR KIM YOUNG SAM IN AN "ADDRESS FOR CELEBRATING 
MARCH 1", TALKING ABOUT "POSSIBLE PROVOCATION" BY THE NORTH, 
CRIED FOR "SECURITY". HE SAID THAT NO ONE CANNOT PREDICT 
WHAT  AND WHEN WILL  HAPPEN ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA AND 
THERE WILL COME  A TERRIBLE DISASTER. HIS REMARKS ONLY 
REMIND ONE OF AN ARSONIST CRYING "FIRE" FIRST.
   WE MAKE CLEAR THE TRUTH BY TAKING THIS OPPORTUNITY. WE 
HAVE RESTRAINED OURSELVES FROM TAKING ISSUE WITH KIM YOUNG 
SAM  ON HIS PAST RECORDS. WE SOLEMNLY DECARE THAT WHEN OUR 
MOUTH IS OPENED, HE WILL BE OSTRACIZED POLITICALLY.
   WE WILL MERCILESSLY PUNISH ONE WHO IMPAIRS THE 
HEADQUARTERS OF OUR REVOLUTION,  WHETHER HE IS A CHIEF 
CULPRIT OR A BEHIND-THE-SCENE MANIPULATOR.
   WE WILL IN THE FUTURE, TOO, STRONGLY DEAL WITH  SUCH 
MOVES AS EMPLOYING VULGAR PLOTS WHICH GET ON OUR NERVE WITH 
ANY CASE AND  DETERIORATING THE INTER-KORAEN RELATIONS AND 
THE SITUATION ON THE KOREAN PENINSULA, REGARDING THEM AS 
INTENTIONAL ACTS TO HAMPER THE REUNIFICATION OF KOREA AND 
WRECK PEACE AND SECURITY IN ASIA.
